name: Activepieces
headline: Open-source, AI-first and no-code business automation tool
description:
Activepieces is an open-source (MIT) business automation software.
For example, you can build automations to receive email and Slack notifications about new contacts add to your HubSpot CRM.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:workflow-automation; industry:open-source; industry:no-code; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ashraf Samhouri, Co-founder and CEO
founders.description: Ended up responsible for growing our ARR so I guess I do sales from the perspective of a software engineer, on a mission to make AI a native part of enterprise through open source automation (aka Activepieces)

founders.name: Mohammad AbuAboud, Co-Founder & CTO
founders.description: I love building cool stuff. Started programming at 13 and never looked back—turns out, breaking things is the fastest way to learn.

#  Automation software that's  AI-first, no-code & open-source
Companies use Activepieces to help their teams use AI in their daily workflows — and you can, too! 
[ Start free ](https://www.activepieces.com/<https:/cloud.activepieces.com/sign-up>)[Talk to sales](https://www.activepieces.com/</sales>)
![](https://www.activepieces.com/g2-logo.png)![](https://www.activepieces.com/stars.png)4.8
##  Trusted by companies from startups to Fortune 50 
![Posthog](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/posthog.svg)
![Sequoia](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/sequoia.svg)
![Redbull](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/redbull.svg)
![Rakuten](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/rakuten.svg)
![Contentful](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/contentful.svg)
![Roblox](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/roblox.svg)
![ClickUp](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/clickup.svg)
![Alan](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/alan.svg)
![DocuSign](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/docusign.svg)
![Pipedrive](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/pipedrive.svg)
![Posthog](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/posthog.svg)
![Sequoia](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/sequoia.svg)

![DocuSign](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/docusign.svg)
![Pipedrive](https://www.activepieces.com/logos/pipedrive.svg)
##  Don't miss out on AI adoption 
AI is changing very quickly. In 2025, your IT team should supervise rather than implement each AI workflow. 
![catalyst](https://www.activepieces.com/story/catalyst.webp)
IT teams should be catalysts, not constraints 
Your IT team excels at managing software infrastructure and that's what they should be doing every day. Don't overwhelm them with the details of implementation. 
![knowhow](https://www.activepieces.com/story/knowhow.webp)
Departments know-how is tough to transfer 
Forcing your teams to share their know-how with IT and engineering will only increase the overhead and tension across the organization. 
![superpowers](https://www.activepieces.com/story/superpowers.webp)
Hidden superpowers reside in your departments 
ChatGPT made it clear that everyone is capable of inventing technology. Your teams will impress you by how much work they can automate. 
[Catch up on AI adoption](https://www.activepieces.com/</sales>)
##  A powerhouse needs an engine 
Like nothing in the market — Activepieces is built perfectly for tech teams to deploy and manage, and can't be easier for non-technical teams to utilize. 
Loved by IT and engineering teams 
Activepieces is based on a fast growing open source project with hundreds of contributors. You never get stuck if a connector is missing or an issue arises. 
Loved by all departments 
End users love building AI automations on Activepieces. We offer an exceptional building experience everyone at your organization will thank you for. 
Maximum Security 
From hosting Activepieces in your own infrastructure to scanning the code for vulnerabilities, Activepieces is the most secure automation software in the market. 
![Maximum Security](https://www.activepieces.com/story/security.webp)
##  Your whole organization, automated 
Like it or not, AI is going to be in every department of every organization. Activepieces is the infrastructure that enables your team to keep up to speed. 
Sales & Marketing 
Lead follow-ups, email campaigns, social media scheduling, CRM updates, lead scoring 
![departments](https://www.activepieces.com/story/departments.webp)
HR
Employee onboarding, document collection, training schedules 
Service Operations 
Ticket assignment, response automation, customer feedback 
Finance
Invoice processing, expense tracking, financial reporting, payroll management 
Operations
Inventory management, supply chain optimization, task automation 
##  Curious to learn more? 
## [AI Trends Shaping the Enterprise Landscape in 2024](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/ai-trends-2024>)
Gartner says 65% of enterprises will have deployed some kind of hyperautomation this year, let's explore the top AI trends in enterprise.
[AI Trends Shaping the Enterprise Landscape in 2024 Read more ](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/ai-trends-2024>)
## [Staying AI-Agile With AI Infrastructure Tools](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/ai-deployment-software>)
You can't stay on top of AI if you centralize AI deployment within one of your departments. Learn how to stay "AI" agile.
[Staying AI-Agile With AI Infrastructure Tools Read more ](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/ai-deployment-software>)
## [Addressing Enterprise Employee Concerns About AI](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/easing-ai-fears>)
Building an inclusive culture is crucial to your AI adoption strategy. Learn how to build a culture of "AI and You" not "AI to replace you" within your organization.
[Addressing Enterprise Employee Concerns About AI Read more ](https://www.activepieces.com/</blog/easing-ai-fears>)
##  Built on the best open source software 
### No-code automation
Builder  Conditions  Loops  Languages  Code with AI 
### Sky is the limit
Webhooks  HTTP  Code 
### Solid and reliable
Auto retry  Versioning 
### Management tools
Whitelabelling  Hide pieces  Custom templates 
## Make automations with the simplest builder you will ever see
## Add the if-this-then-that logic to make powerful automations
## Repeat your actions for each item in a list of items
## Switch the builder to one of the many languages it can speak
## Let the AI write code for you to unlock all the automation potential
## Receive data from any service with our Webhook trigger
## Send requests to any service with our generic HTTP piece
## Write Javascript and bring in your favorite npm packages
## Set a step to auto retry when it fails for higher reliability
## Restore an older version of your flow if you break it by mistake
## Brand the builder with your own color and logo
## Control which pieces will show in the builder for your clients and users
## Add relevant automation templates to your clients use cases
##  Automate the apps that matter to you 
Our pieces library grows every day through our team and community contributions 
[ Browse our 261 pieces ](https://www.activepieces.com/</pieces>)

generated_description:
### Activepieces: Your No-Code AI Automation Partner

**Overview**
Activepieces is an open-source, AI-first, no-code business automation tool launched in 2022 and hailing from San Francisco, nestled in the vibrant Y Combinator Batch S22. With a lean team of 10 employees, it aims to simplify the automation landscape for businesses of all sizes.

**Mission**
The vision at Activepieces is straightforward: enable organizations to automate their workflows seamlessly through AI-driven solutions, without needing to write a single line of code. Imagine receiving automated notifications from your HubSpot about new contacts—this is just a glimpse of what's possible with Activepieces.

**Key Features**
- **Open-Source Advantage**: Licensed under the MIT, Activepieces has gained significant traction with around 10,000 stars on GitHub, fostering a community that continuously contributes to its development.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: The platform is designed for everyone—from tech-savvy individuals to those with zero coding experience. It's all about making automation accessible.
- **AI Integration**: The "AI Pieces" feature allows users to create simplified AI agents that enhance their workflows. The application is built to be robust enough for IT teams while remaining intuitive for non-technical users.
- **Compatibility**: Activepieces connects with numerous applications, enabling users to weave together various tools into a cohesive workflow.

**Current Offerings**
Activepieces is hard at work expanding its capabilities. Features in the pipeline include a chat interface for advanced logic in conversations, assistance with coding through AI, as well as tools for governance and compliance to help organizations manage their workflows securely.

**Security and Usability**
Security is not just an add-on; it’s built into Activepieces' DNA. Users can host the software on their own infrastructure, ensuring control over sensitive data, while ongoing code scanning protects against vulnerabilities.

**Community and Support**
Activepieces actively encourages a collaborative environment, offering extensive documentation, a community forum, and engagement through platforms like Discord. The focus on knowledge sharing helps foster innovation, making it easier for teams to adopt and adapt automation practices.

**Conclusion**
In a world where AI continues to accelerate business processes, Activepieces stands out by marrying open-source flexibility with no-code simplicity. Whether you're a small startup or a Fortune 50 company, this tool aims to unlock automation's full potential across all departments, making it easier for teams to leverage AI in everyday operations. 

Curious to dive in? Explore more [here](https://www.activepieces.com).
